mapper.select: SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM WHERE TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' -- 개인 AND TLM.COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND TLM.PL_M_NAME = #{plMName} AND TLM.PL_CELLPHONE = #{plCellphone} AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '2' -- 모집인상태 : 승인완료 AND TLM.PL_STAT = '9' -- 처리상태 : 완료 AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1
SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM WHERE TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' -- 개인 AND TLM.PL_M_NAME = #{plMName} AND TLM.PL_CELLPHONE = #{plCellphone} AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '1' AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.pl_regist_no FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM WHERE TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' -- 개인 AND TLM.PL_M_NAME = #{plMName} AND TLM.PL_CELLPHONE = #{plCellphone} AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '3' AND TLM.PL_STAT = '9' AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM WHERE TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' -- 법인 AND TLM.COM_CODE = #{comCode} AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo} AND TLM.PL_CEO_NAME = #{plCeoName} AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '2' -- 모집인상태 : 승인완료 AND TLM.PL_STAT = '9' -- 처리상태 : 완료 AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM WHERE TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' -- 법인 AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo} AND TLM.PL_CEO_NAME = #{plCeoName} AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '3' -- 모집인상태 : 승인완료 AND TLM.PL_STAT = '9' -- 처리상태 : 완료 AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1
SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM WHERE TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo} AND TLM.PL_CEO_NAME = #{plCeoName} AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '1' AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.MASTER_TO_ID ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM
,TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(TLM.MEMBER_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM ,TLM.PL_CLASS ,FN_CD_DTL('CLS001',TLM.PL_CLASS) AS PL_CLASS_NM ,TLM.CORP_USER_YN ,TLM.CAREER_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CAR001',TLM.CAREER_TYP) AS CAREER_TYP_NM ,TLM.PL_PRODUCT ,FN_CD_DTL('PRD001',TLM.PL_PRODUCT) AS PL_PRODUCT_NM ,TLM.PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',TLM.PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',TLM.PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,TLM.PL_REGIST_NO ,TLM.CON_NUM ,TLM.CI ,TLM.PL_M_NAME ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE ,TLM.ADDR ,TLM.ADDR_DETAIL ,TLM.PL_EDU_NO ,TLM.CAREER_START_DATE ,TLM.CAREER_END_DATE ,TLM.ENTRUST_DATE ,case when TLM.COM_CONT_DATE = '' then null when TLM.COM_CONT_DATE is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.COM_CONT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') end AS COM_CONT_DATE ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,TLM.PL_CEO_NAME ,TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLM.PL_BUSINESS_NO ,TLM.COMP_PHONE_NO ,TLM.CORP_FOUND_DATE ,TLM.CAPITAL ,TLM.PL_PAY_STAT
,TLM.COM_REG_DATE ,TLM.CRE_APP_DATE ,TLM.CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,TLM.PAY_DATE ,TLM.SEND_MSG ,TLM.PL_HIST_CD ,TLM.COM_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP ,(SELECT NAME FROM TB_LC_PAY WHERE MASTER_SEQ = TLM.MASTER_SEQ LIMIT 1) AS PAY_NAME ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM WHERE TLM.MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} AND TLM.PL_STAT = '9' -- 처리상태가 완료인 것 AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = #{plRegStat} AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT VIOLATION_SEQ ,MASTER_SEQ ,VIOLATION_CD ,FN_CD_DTL('VIT001',VIOLATION_CD) AS VIOLATION_CD_NM ,REG_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_LC_VIOLATION WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.PL_M_Z_ID ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM, TB_LC_PAY PAY WHERE TLM.PL_CLASS = '1' -- 개인 AND TLM.PL_M_NAME = #{plMName} AND TLM.PL_CELLPHONE = #{plCellphone} AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '3' -- 모집인상태 : 자격취득 AND TLM.PL_STAT = '9' -- 처리상태 : 완료 AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TLM.MASTER_SEQ = PAY.MASTER_SEQ LIMIT 1

SELECT TLM.MASTER_SEQ ,TLM.PRE_LC_NUM FROM TB_LC_MAS01 TLM, TB_LC_PAY PAY WHERE TLM.PL_CLASS = '2' -- 법인 AND TLM.PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo} AND TLM.PL_CEO_NAME = #{plCeoName} AND TLM.PL_REG_STAT = '3' -- 모집인상태 : 자격취득 AND TLM.PL_STAT = '9' -- 처리상태 : 완료 AND TLM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TLM.MASTER_SEQ = PAY.MASTER_SEQ LIMIT 1

SELECT a.MASTER_SEQ , PL_REGIST_NO , a.PL_M_NAME , a.PL_CLASS , a.PL_M_Z_ID , FN_CELLPHONE(a.PL_CELLPHONE) AS PL_CELLPHONE , a.PL_MERCHANT_NO , a.PL_CEO_NAME , (SELECT b.name FROM TB_LC_PAY b WHERE a.MASTER_SEQ = b.MASTER_SEQ LIMIT 1) AS PAY_NAME , (SELECT b.amt FROM TB_LC_PAY b WHERE a.MASTER_SEQ = b.MASTER_SEQ LIMIT 1) AS AMT , (SELECT TO_CHAR(b.REG_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM TB_LC_PAY b WHERE a.MASTER_SEQ = b.MASTER_SEQ LIMIT 1) AS PAY_DATE FROM TB_LC_MAS01 a WHERE a.MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} LIMIT 1

select a.master_seq , a.pre_lc_num , a.pl_product , a.pl_class , a.com_code from tb_lc_mas01 a, ( select ci ,pl_m_name from tb_lc_mas01 where master_seq = #{masterSeq} ) b where b.ci = a.ci and b.pl_m_name = a.pl_m_name and (a.pl_regist_no is null or a.pl_regist_no = '') and a.pl_reg_stat = '1' and a.pre_reg_yn = 'N' and a.use_yn = 'Y'

select a.master_seq , a.pre_lc_num , a.pl_product , a.pl_class , a.com_code from tb_lc_mas01 a, ( select pl_merchant_no , pl_ceo_name from tb_lc_mas01 where master_seq = #{masterSeq} ) b where b.pl_merchant_no = a.pl_merchant_no and b.pl_ceo_name = a.pl_ceo_name and (a.pl_regist_no is null or a.pl_regist_no = '') and a.pl_reg_stat = '1' and a.pre_reg_yn = 'N' and a.use_yn = 'Y'

select a.master_seq , a.pre_lc_num , a.pl_product , a.pl_class , a.com_code from tb_lc_mas01 a, ( select ci ,pl_m_name from tb_lc_mas01 where master_seq = #{masterSeq} ) b where b.ci = a.ci and b.pl_m_name = a.pl_m_name and (a.pl_regist_no is null or a.pl_regist_no = '') and a.pl_reg_stat = '2' and a.pl_stat = '9' and a.use_yn = 'Y'

select a.master_seq , a.pre_lc_num , a.pl_product , a.pl_class , a.com_code from tb_lc_mas01 a, ( select pl_merchant_no , pl_ceo_name from tb_lc_mas01 where master_seq = #{masterSeq} ) b where b.pl_merchant_no = a.pl_merchant_no and b.pl_ceo_name = a.pl_ceo_name and (a.pl_regist_no is null or a.pl_regist_no = '') and a.pl_reg_stat = '2' and a.pl_stat = '9' and a.use_yn = 'Y'
